visit_notes: Patient reports improved diet compliance. Blood sugar readings mostly in range. Advised to continue medication, monitor blood pressure at home, and schedule eye exam for diabetes screening. Follow up in 6 weeks.
alerts: A1C slightly elevated - reinforce diet adherence

visit_notes: Patient progressing well post-surgery. ROM improving. Still using cane for distance. No signs of DVT or infection. Warfarin levels therapeutic. Continue PT 3x/week. Watch for swelling, fever, or increased pain. Follow up in 2 weeks.
alerts: Post-op anticoagulation - monitor for bleeding, bruising

visit_notes: Asthma well controlled on current regimen. Patient reports occasional night cough. Allergy season approaching - continue daily controller. PEF values within personal best. Follow up in 3 months or sooner if symptoms worsen.

AF well controlled post-ablation. Patient reports no palpitations. BP and weight stable. Advised to continue anticoagulation and diuretic, monitor fluid intake. Repeat echocardiogram in 6 months. Follow up in 4 weeks.
alerts: Monitor for signs of fluid overload

visit_notes: Patient reports improvement in anxiety symptoms since starting sertraline. Sleep quality better with trazodone. PHQ-4 score down from 8 to 4. Continue current regimen. Discussed coping strategies. Follow up in 4 weeks.
